page.title: 14FRIDAY, JULY 5TH 1985
page.content: (contd) She took her daughter to the doctor's, then collected the prescription and drove her to school. She arranged flowers in the synagogue in Northwood before returning home.The afternoon was devoted to housework and listening to Wimbledon on the radio. When her daughter returned from school, she took her to pick strawberries and then to the stables. After collecting her husband and elder daughter from the stations, she had a meal, watched TV and went to bed. Francesca(18) caught the 7.40 train to London arriving at her place of work, Harrod's, at 8.35. She had a break of 1/2 hour for coffee and 1 hour for lunch and left work at 5pm. After a bath, supper and TV, she went out for the evening. When Rachel(13) woke,she had a swollen ear so needed to visit the doctor.
